metadata.title: CVE-2021-21117 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Cryptohome in Google Chrome prior to88.0.4324.96 allowed a local attacker to perform OS-level privilegeescalation via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
